instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Drizzle a medium baking sheet with vegetable oil.
instructions.2: In a large, resealable plastic bag, mix flour, paprika, mustard powder, salt, and pepper. Place sweet potato wedges in the bag, and toss to coat.
instructions.3: Arrange coated sweet potato wedges on the prepared baking sheet. Bake 20 to 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until browned and crisp.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the oven from Step 1 being used?
Is oven from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is oven from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the oven in Step 3?
Can we preheat (Step 1) and arrange (Step 3) at the same time?
